name: RURAL ORGANIZATION OF AWARENESS DEVELOPMENT SERVICE

address: H.No: 1-36/1,  Muthireddy Gudem Village, Bhongir Mandal, Nalgonda District

briefDescription: ROADS acronym for Rural organization of Awareness Development service. It was established in 1999 with the support of the stakeholders, Dalit communities, and weaker sections of Nalgonda district. This organization was registered under Societies Act 1350 Falsie, with registration number 2669/19999. It has been working among schedule caste, Schedule Tribes, and socio political economic backward communities of the society. ROADS work with in fifteen mandals of Nalgonda district. The organization had a big goal of liberating Dalit communities from the below poverty line. Dalith is one of the “scheduled castes” in Telangana
